&reftitle.parameters;
normalized
Normalize the color values. Possible values are 0, 1 or 2.
List of possible values for normalized
normalized Description
0
The RGB values are returned as ints in the range 0 to 255 (inclusive.) The alpha value is returned as int and is either 0 or 1.
1
The RGBA values are returned as floats in the range 0 to 1 (inclusive.)
2
The RGBA values are returned as ints in the range 0 to 255 (inclusive.)

&reftitle.returnvalues;
An array of channel values. Throws ImagickPixelException on error.
